text:
COMPREHENSION
He understands longer texts and explanations. He can comprehend main ideas and can comprehend well.
SPEAKING
He has reasonable fluency and is able to create sentences during our discussion but there were pauses and hesitations.
VOCABULARY
He has good vocabulary skills. He knows so many words therefore he is very participative in conversation.
GRAMMAR
As for his sentences, he can make long sentences and can communicate well enough. He needs to focus on constructing correct sentences. He has minimal errors.
WM ENG
trans:
COMPRÉHENSION
Il comprend des textes et des explications plus longs. Il peut saisir les idées principales et a une bonne compréhension.
EXPRESSION ORALE
Il a une fluidité raisonnable et est capable de construire des phrases pendant notre discussion, mais il y a eu des pauses et des hésitations.
VOCABULAIRE
Il a de bonnes compétences en vocabulaire. Il connaît beaucoup de mots, ce qui le rend très participatif dans les conversations.
GRAMMAIRE
Quant à ses phrases, il peut faire des phrases longues et communiquer assez bien. Il doit se concentrer sur la construction de phrases correctes. Il fait des erreurs minimes.
WM ENG
